channel.title: Description on Elie Hymowitz
channel.description: Recent content in Description on Elie Hymowitz

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! Thanks for visiting my website! This is where I get to write and post about things that I make and work on. I don’t generally talk about myself too much, but here goes - if you’re interested in learning about me this is the place for that. When I was 18 I left my hometown of Seattle, Washington and spent a gap year living in Israel. After that I moved to Montreal to do an undergraduate degree in materials engineering at McGill University.
